Assessment of Treatment Plant Performance and Water Quality Data using R, RStudio, and the tidyverse Some combo of Grahamâ€™s lab team 2020-02-29 Chapter 1 Prerequisites This book is a companion guide to the open-access book Assessment of Treatment Plant Performance and Water Quality Data by Marcos von Sperling, Matthew E. Verbyla, and SÃ­lvia M. A. C. Oliveira (von Sperling, Verbyla, and Oliveira 2020). 1.1 R, RStudio, and the tidyverse (installation instructions) (citations to make a references section) (R Core Team 2019; Wickham 2019). 1.2 Colophon Written using knitr, bookdown, and RMarkdown (Xie 2020b, 2020a; Allaire et al. 2020).
